4.25. umbra.exceptions¶

exceptions.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
This module defines Umbra package exceptions.

Others:

4.25.1. Functions¶

umbra.exceptions.notifyExceptionHandler(*args)[source]¶

This definition provides a notifier exception handler.

Parameters:*args – Arguments. ( * )
Returns:Definition success. ( Boolean )
